GRAVE_FAKE_SYS_04: The statue emitted light, and seems to have rotated another statue.
GRAVE_FAKE_SYS_05: It looks like the statue can't move anymore.
STONE_ROTATE_QUE: This statue can be rotated. In which direction would you like to turn it?Č
GIMMICK_NOT_CLEAR_002: The Stone Statues have returned to their original positions.
SYS_HELP_MES_010: You have only one move remaining...
GRAVE_NPC_GOST_REC: ̄The ghost of a monster, stuck between the worlds of the living and the dead.
GRAVE_NPC_CHOMACH_REC: ̄A Nochoro seeking the ultimate program. It also has quite the adventurous attitude.
GRAVE_NPC_BUNDORUDO_REC: ̄The Great King of Plunder, who's taken over the Undead Garden, is extremely cautious.
NPC_GOST_E_010: ̂Bundold is a coward. He's hiding somewhere in the basement of this place.
NPC_GOST_E_020:
̂That coward Bundold has finally been defeated! This is great news.
ā
And you're the one who did it. You aren't half bad after all!
REC_POINT_HERUKONDORU: ̄A stone statue shaped like a Hades Condor.
NPC_GOST_E_030: ̂It looks like the outside area has returned to normal once again. But how long are we going to remain safe... ?
NPC_GOST_E_040:
̂I heard that you once defeated a huge monster.
ā
Well... I shouldn't be surprised. After all, you are the guardian of this world!
NPC_GOST_E_050: ̂Yo! What brings you back to the Undead Gardens today?
NPC_GOST_E_BY_CROW:
̂I thought, had I met you here, I'd give you this.
It's rare to find a town like this!
NPC_GOST_F_010:
̂Lucia created puzzles to conceal the Resistance's base within these Undead Gardens.
ā
I recall reading a note written by Lucia herself, on a bookshelf somewhere on how to solve these puzzles.
NPC_CHOMACH_010:
́Get a load of this, ȁ!
ā
This parchment here seems to be about the next puzzle... it appears to be more difficult than the last...
NPC_CHOMACH_020:
́I'm going to look around a little more, and then head back to the Fallen City!
ā
Are you considering going to the Grim Tundra? The device leading there is out back.
ā
You should now be able to open the door leading to the Grim Tundra Transportation Device!
MINE_WALL_PAPER_001:
Within three moves, make them see eye-to-eye.
Only then will the path forward open.
MINE_BOOK_SHELF_001:
There appear to be notes written by the Resistance in here...
ā
"They seem to be coming from the Darkiron Bastille.
ā
There's no way we can infiltrate that place at this time to put a stop to them, either.
ā
What can we possibly do next? We'll likely need to consult Lucia."
REC_RA_MONS_MES:
̄An Insurgent Demon transformed by Mother's
rampage. It has an frightening amount of power.
MINE_BOOK_SHELF_002:
Research on Reactors appears to be written in here.
ā
"Testing the new Reactor went well. Final preparations are being made in order to deliver them to our secret base.
ā
Enemy reinforcements are coming to stop us. Somehow, I will manage to finish them."
MINE_BOOK_HINT_001:
There is a note here.
ā
First, rotate the upper left statue to the right.
MINE_BOOK_HINT_002:
There is a note here.
ā
Second, head to the lower right statue and rotate it left.
MINE_BOOK_HINT_003:
There is a note here.
ā
The rest is up to you! I can't make it too easy!
MINE_BOOK_HINT_004: The shelf is stocked with boring, ordinary literature.
DEMO_209_AFT_SYS_01: It did not react. A security code is needed to move the device...
REC_POINT_DOOR_02:
̄A wall that seems rather unnaturally placed. 
Perhaps there's more to this wall than meets the eye.
REC_POINT_BOOK_02: ̄Most of the books have been organized alphabetically. It's a large collection.
REC_POINT_MONITOR_02:
̄An apparatus used by the Resistance for controlling the Undead Garden.
ā
You can likely download the data from it using your Reactor.
REC_POINT_REACTOR_02: ̄A broken reactor has been carelessly misplaced.
REC_POINT_KIRAPANSA: ̄Stone statue in the shape of a Great Sabrecat.
REC_POINT_TOTUGEKIUO: ̄Stone statue in the shape of a Fangfish.
REC_POINT_HARIGAMI_02: ̄An ancient-looking piece of parchment paper. There's some legible writting on it.
REC_POINT_GRAVE_01_2:
̄Attuning to this Zoom Stone will add it to your destination list.
These stones appear in various places around the world.
